lexUnit.name: obey.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: behave in accordance with (a general principle, natural law, etc.)

sentence.text: When the ` Wolf " catches her he may obey the laws of the game and avoid physically hurting her , but giving her a momentary fright is a legitimate part of the game .

Law can prohibit or regulate activities : The citizen can obey or break the law .
